settings.title: Rayshawn Tyree - Barber
settings.info:
RayShawn Tyree is a Licensed Barber who has been with us since 2019, and has provided professional services for over 18 years. RayShawn specializes in hairlines. He offers different alternatives for those who struggle with damaged or receding hairlines.

He performs all Men's Grooming and Styling as well as female haircuts and color processing. He has won over 49 awards at National Hair Shows and constantly updates his portfolio with new education and training.

For appointments you can find RayShawn on Booksy where he has a 5 star rating in Chicago.

Booking link: bubbacutz.booksy.com
